summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Mary E. Erdoes, discussing a meeting and modeling work. Epstein expresses appreciation for Erdoes' efforts and suggests a phone call to discuss ideas further. The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and indicates the privileged nature of the communication.
